Preconditions: Camera device available; Multiple resolution support
Expected-Result: System accepts resolution and starts video capture
Pass-Criteria: Video stream active at specified resolution
Fail-Criteria: Resolution rejected or video fails to start

Action: Attempt to set video resolution to 100x100 (invalid partition)
Expected-Result: System rejects invalid resolution with error message
Pass-Criteria: Clear error message displayed to user
Fail-Criteria: System accepts invalid resolution or crashes
Notes: Test invalid partition: below minimum supported
